channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The children learn about the weather. There is a new friend for Peppa, and Grandpa Pig is making a rock garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are working in their home office and Peppa wants to 'work' like them too. Peppa decides that she needs her own office, so she takes the cupboard under the stairs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa, George, Molly Mole and Freddy Fox play in the garden. Molly digs a tunnel and hits a box of pirate treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit pretend to be babies to get Mummy Rabbit's attention. Mummy Rabbit plays along until they admit they are not really babies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Pedro loves superheroes. He has a superhero-themed party and Super Potato is one of the guests.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig decide to go and pick their own strawberries at Miss Rabbit's strawberry farm.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben, Holly and their friends go on a snail trek with Miss Jolly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Barnaby Elf's uncle, Redbeard the Elf Pirate, comes to visit the Little Kingdom, but he has lost his treasure. Everyone must help Redbeard track down the treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben Elf and his parents are going on holiday in the elf truck but Gaston the Ladybird has swallowed the car keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly takes some frogspawn home from class to look after, but is surprised when the frogspawn turns into tadpoles overnight. Soon there are lots of little frogs for Holly to look after.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Mighty Pups take on new super-baddie, The Copycat. It'll take all their effort to take down their most formidable foe yet.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Ladybird is up to her old tricks, but the Mighty Twins have a trick of their own in 'Pups and the Big Twin Trick', and in 'Pups Save the Mega Mayor', Mayor Humdinger gets super powers.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The Crew has a mishap in 'The Crew Builds a Skate Park', and then in 'The Crew Builds a Tunnel', the Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Darington can't wait to ride the tallest, fastest carnival ride in all of Axle City! But when Darington's tickets blow away, he and Blaze must try to retrieve them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa, George and Freddy Fox are mistaken for pirates while sailing on the river with Grandpa Pig, complete with costumes and a Jolly Roger flag.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's Captain Daddy Dog's birthday and Mummy Dog surprises him with the gift of a boat trip, which isn't quite what he had expected.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The family has all gone to the caves for a day out and Grampy Rabbit is their tour guide.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa brings home a teddy from Playgroup to look after, but she is worried that he won't have a very exciting time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse. Grampy Rabbit knows all about the sea, and can make a lot of noise too, which is useful.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George notice they have shadows, and no matter how fast they walk, run, or jump - they can't lose them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: With the building work done, it's time to decorate! Peppa and George have fun choosing how to decorate their attic bedrooms. It's dinosaurs for George, but what will Peppa pick.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Zebra arrives with a new car seat for the baby! Excited to try it in the car, the family soon realise it won't fit with Peppa and George too. It's time for a new car.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: An injured baby monkey is rescued in 'The Cat That Roared', then in 'Saving the Safe', Mayor Humdinger rebuilds Meow Meow to break into Mayor Goodway's new safe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Benny embrace his singing skills in 'Singin' in the Tub', then in 'Show and Share', Dora helps Boots find something for Show and Share.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Daisy's game is missing in 'Borrower Daisy', then in 'Can Do Croc', a perfect Step-Mother's day for Maggie all depends on Daisy and Mr. Crocodile finding a can opener.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Two robots take on more than they can handle in 'Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends', then in 'Pups Save the Rainbow', Mayor Humdinger finds a prism that drains Adventure Bay of colour.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Grandma go on the search for treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: It's the Roar festival, and Tim wants to have the best Roar in town.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia find a lost mammoth in their house.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Speed Meister sabotages the town Talent Show in 'The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage', then in 'The Crew Builds Instruments', Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: A bad haircut threatens to ruin more than just Steve's good looks in 'Bad Hair Day!', then in 'Kanga Ruiner!', the team travels to Australia to stop a giant Mecha-Roo.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Mr. Crocodile wants to be a good guest in 'Birthday Party', then in 'Tick Tock Mr. Croc', Mr. Crocodile and Daisy misplace their concert tickets while rushing to get there on time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Today is a very hot day. Peppa and George splash about in their paddling pool. Then there are ice creams for everyone.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Labrador is here in his new ice cream van. It is his first day selling ice creams. In fact, Mr Labrador loves ice cream - perhaps a little too much.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's family squeeze into the new car that Daddy Pig is trying out for fun.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George for a day on his boat. They see Mr. Bull, who's using his digger boat to remove all the rubbish in the river that shouldn't be there.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team in 'Pups Save the Soccer Game', and in 'Pups Save a Lucky Collar', Marshall wins a new collar, and he's sure it's bringing him good luck.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle in 'Pups Save Bedtime', then in 'Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg', Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it rolls away and is heading through town.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Benny embrace his singing skills in 'Singin' in the Tub', then in 'Show and Share', Dora helps Boots find something for Show and Share.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are working in their home office and Peppa wants to 'work' like them too. Peppa decides that she needs her own office, so she takes the cupboard under the stairs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are visiting Cousin Chloe's House to play with Baby Alexander. Peppa learns babies are not like dolls at all, and do lots of things every day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa receives an invite to Candy Cat's birthday party - on a double decker bus.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and friends are at Penny Polar Bear's house for a movie night. But before they can watch it, the children need to decide where to sit, and which popcorn to eat.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep and Suzy take Granny Pig and Peppa around Art House Day. After a day full of screen printing and silhouette miniatures, Granny Pig finds the perfect artwork.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle and Mr Bull lead the children to the wildflower wood to learn all about flowers. The children enjoy identifying Wild Garlic, Bluebells and even an orchid.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.
